ships.name: R.I.S. Talvath
ships.text: ACTION: If you are within Range 1-3 of at least 1 enemy ship, roll 3 defense dice. For every [evade] result, place 1 [evade] Token beside your ship. You cannot perform any free Actions this round.

captains.name: Telek R'Mor
captains.text:
Each time you defend, if you have at least 1 [scan] Token beside your ship, roll +1 defense die.

You may field the Secret Research [talent] Upgrade.

captains.name: Alidar Jarok
captains.text: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 and remove 1 Token ([evade], [scan], [battlestations], or [target-lock]) from beside that ship. If you remove a [target-lock] Token with this ability, also remove the corresponding [target-lock] Token.

admirals.name: Alidar Jarok
admirals.text: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1 and remove 1 Token ([evade], [scan], [battlestations], or [target-lock]) from beside that ship. If you remove a [target-lock] Token with this ability, also remove the corresponding [target-lock] Token.

upgrades.name: Secret Research
upgrades.text:
Add the [scan] Action to your Action Bar. If this card is discarded, you no longer have the [scan] Action on your Action Bar.

During the Activation Phase, you may discard this card to perform a [scan] Action as a free Action.

This card costs +5 SP if purchased for any ship other than a Romulan Science Vessel.

upgrades.name: Warp Core Ejection System
upgrades.text:
ACTION: Discard this card to repair 1 damage to your Hull and flip any Warp Core Breach critical damage cards assigned to your ship face down. For the rest of the game, you cannot perform any maneuvers with a speed greater than 1 and you cannot receive a Warp Core Breach critical damage card. If you do, immediately flip the card face down and treat it as normal damage.
No ship may be equipped with more than one Warp Core Ejection System Upgrade.

upgrades.name: Test Cylinder
upgrades.text:
ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at any Range. Disable this card and 1 [crew] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Romulan Science Vessel.

upgrades.name: Temporal Displacement
upgrades.text: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may discard this card to cancel all of the attacking ship's [hit] and [crit] results. All cards that were used during the attack are returned to the state that they were in prior to the attack. The attacking ship cannot perform any more attacks during the round this ability is used. This card may only be purchased for a Romulan Science Vessel.

upgrades.name: Advanced Scanning
upgrades.text:
Add the [scan] Action to your Action Bar. If this card is discarded, you no longer have the [scan] Action on your Action Bar.
Whenever your perform the [scan] Action, you may place 1 additional [scan] Token beside your ship. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

This card costs +5 SP for any ship other than a Romulan Science Vessel.

upgrades.name: Signal Amplifier
upgrades.text:
You may discard this card and spend 1 [scan] Token to add +2 attack dice or +2 defense dice.


This Upgrade costs +5 SP for any ship other than a Romulan Science Vessel and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 Signal Amplifier Upgrade.

upgrades.name: Graviton Field Generator
upgrades.text:
ACTION: Disable this card and up to 2 of your Active Shields to immediately perform an additional [straight] maneuver with a speed equal to the number of shields you disabled with this Action.
OR
ACTION: If you performed a green maneuver this round, discard this card to place 2 Shield Tokens beside your ship. When suffering damage this round, remove those Shield Tokens first.
